page.title: 04KATIE'S MONDAY MORNING
page.content: I usually wake at 6.30 a.m. in order to dress at 7.oo. By the time I am dressed it is about 7.15. No-one is awake when I rise, so I have to be quiet. Mondays are always busy because of swimming in the morning and gymnastics in the evening. A quick breakfast is followed by 'Popeye' on TVAM, but then I switch channels. My breakfast consists of a yoghurt and a piece of fruit. My mother awakes and comes down at about 8.00 a.m., and we leave before 8.40 to go to school. At school, the register and swimming numbers are called, then we do either Maths or English before Swimming. At the Baths we sometimes have to swim fourteen lengths, but usually it is only six. Sometimes we do diving practice or grades. Then it is back to school for a nice salad.
